subtitleNullable: Image Classification on Farm-Captured Cassava Leaves
descriptionNullable:
## Background
### Makerere University Cassava Image Dataset
The dataset was created to provide an open-source and well-curated image dataset showing diseased and healthy cassava leaf images from Uganda. This will be used by data scientists, researchers, the wider machine learning community, and experts from other domains to conduct research into automating the identification and modeling of cassava crop disease in Uganda and potentially in other regions too. Previously published datasets have had issues with **class mislabeling** and real-world application for infield usage of Cassava Images for disease identification, due to the limitation with laboratory settings where the images were captured. There was a need to come up with a high-quality and well-labeled real-world dataset that clearly showcases images with these 3 classes: 
1. Cassava Mosaic Disease
2. Cassava Brown Streak 
3. Healthy Specimens

*All the images of the leaves disease were taken in actual farmer gardens.*


## Dataset Description
There are 3 folders that contain Cassava Leaf Images as follows:
File | Description
-------|---------------
`brown_streak` |	Images of leaves having the Brown Streak Disease
`healthy1` |	Healthy Cassava Leaf Images
`mosaic_disease1` |	Images of leaves having the Mosaic Disease



## Citation
```
@data{DVN/T4RB0B_2022,
author = {Tusubira, Francis Jeremy and Nakatumba-Nabende, Joyce and Babirye, Claire and Okao-Okujja, Geoffrey and Mutebi, Chodrine and Mugalu, Ben Wycliff and Nabagereka, Deborah and Namanya, Gloria},
publisher = {Harvard Dataverse},
title = {{Makerere University Cassava Image Dataset}},
year = {2022},
version = {V1},
doi = {10.7910/DVN/T4RB0B},
url = {https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/T4RB0B}
}
```
